events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but want to return it as it doesn't fit and request a refund for the purchase.
Ticket categorized as Refund based on customer request for a refund and return of the jacket.
Support agent assigned to handle customer's refund request for the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out regarding your jacket return. I’m here to help process your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 789654123. Yes, the jacket is still unused and in the original packaging, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label and will issue your refund once we receive the jacket.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick help and clear instructions on the return process.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just following up to confirm you received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Closing the case as refund has been confirmed and no further assistance required by the customer.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience and refund process.
